description:
Hello from the Ethernal. This is a special token for collectors of all five heroes from the Ethernal x Hermippe Heroes series: ΔYa-shaΔ, ↜Warrior↝, ✴Explorer✴, »Barbarian«, and ✧Mage✧.

About the series:
Based on the Ethernal hero characters, pixel artist Komiyama Takashi created 5 artworks: a new limited artwork that’s released every 14 days. Each character have a maximum of 20 art tokens.
name: Ethernal x Hermippe Heroes
